title: Complain about paper quality
review: I have just buy the box set. After opening it I am socked , as the paper quality of the book is not only below standard but poor. So before purchase the box set please verify other sets also. My suggestion to the publisher is, please improve the paper quality, as I think readers are ready to pay more, but can't negotiate with poor paper quality.

title: Not Worth It
review:
When you are buying 5 books of Sherlock Holmes, rather go for a set (box) which has all the 56 stories and 4 novels in it because this one has a total of 30 stories.
I bought this one as it said on the box that it has all the stories but later I found that it is just assorted collection of half of the total stories.

Now, I will have to order a complete set again from some other publisher to complete my collection which will also mean that I have 2 copies of those 30 stories.

Sad Buy !

title: seeing others review felt very bad
review: I was thinking of buying the set but in some reviews I saw to mention that the paper quality is bad so I can't buy the set

title: sherlock holmes
review: Quality of the pages is bad, and low level images.Not interesting to read a novel. But stories are as usual awesome!!!!!!!!!!!

title: page quality not gr8. Buks' alright
review: The books are alright. Not as gud as hyped. Not all that exciting.... But still read a worth for the classic adventures. The quality of books themselves is not as should've been. Cheap paper.

title: Great !!!!! Books
review: Great books and with very good quality of pages for a price. The stories are so interesting that if you started reading it you cannot stop.

title: Sherlock Holmes (Set of 5 Books)
review:
The set was very nice but the sheet quality could have been better. Also some important stories were missing which can confuse readers. They could have added the first story where Sherlock and Watson meet considering the fact this is a set. 
But okay for beginners.

title: Nice.
review:
The set was very nice but the sheet quality could have been better. Also some important stories were missing which can confuse readers. They could have added the first story where Sherlock and Watson meet considering the fact this is a set. 
But okay for beginners.

title: It's really Classic
review: Always liked sherlock from my chilhood.. Bought this one includes set of 5 books and each contain 5 to 6 stories each.. and the paper quality is okay .. I can say its worth for the money

title: Good collection of sherlock stories
review: When i ordered it i was sceptical but now having used it, i can say that it is worth ordering and the price is really amazing, except for some spelling mistakes here and there everythng seems to be alrite!

title: Don't buy! Incomplete set with poor quality.
review:
The product description says "This box set collects all 56 short stories and 4 novels featuring Sir Arthur Conan Doyle’s Sherlock Holmes" which is inaccurate. The box set consists of only 30 short stories without a single novel. Complete waste of time and money.
The paper quality is average, not very good. The packing is very poor.
It is in fact a FRAUD! Don't buy from the dealer 'BOOKBUZZ'

title: Nice collection.
review:
Thanks the books are good and it made happy to the persons I've gifted. They indeed love it

Regards
Raghunandan M S
